reviews.title: A fab hotel with friendly staff and excellent food
reviews.text: The staff were all great and couldn't do enough for you. We were made to feel very welcome and the food was excellent and served at all hours. Will definitely go back. Nick and Jan from Swansea.

reviews.title: A welcome break
reviews.text: A set of 22 apartments in 3 blocks, set in a garden type location

reviews.title: Good value!
reviews.text: Most are 1 bed apartments with a living room with bed settees

First time to turkey in September 2012. Didnt know what to expect as had been told many different things by different people. Arrived very late in the night so could quite a feel of the place, by morning tho i was pleasently surprised.
reviews.title: Fab holiday

reviews.text: A very picturesque setting with the mountains behind you and beautiful blue sky above.
reviews.title: Excellent value for money in a beautiful setting....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Apartment was basic but very clean and we had maid service every day, which surprised me as we were self catering. Fresh towels on a daily basis.
reviews.title: poorly maintained

reviews.text: Cooking facilities were very basic (so dont think you can cook a three course meal) but as there is a pool bar and restaurant serving food all day, you will not go hungry. Food at the complex was really good value for money with very healthy portions.
reviews.title: Lovely apartments - pictures in brochure don't do it justice!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found the staff to be very helpfull and gave us lots of good advice on the surrounding area.
reviews.title: Great Hotel

reviews.text: We have stayed here several times now and cannot wait for our next trip with our teenager and 5 year old. It is in a quiet area just back from the main Ovacik road. Blink and you will miss it as it's not very well signposted, which is why I think it's a hidden gem. The apartments are clean and comfortable with maid service daily. Small pool area and children's pool but even in peak weeks we always seem to be able to get a sunbed. Because it's a small complex it is a very friendly place and a laid back fun atmosphere. The staff are wonderful and very helpful and friendly. Olu Deniz lagoon is breathtaking and Hisaronu is bustling of a night but great for families and couples alike. Fethiye is also worth a trip with a lovely harbour area and restaurants all around it.
reviews.title: A hidden Gem

reviews.text: It's one of those places that people return to year after year because the staff look after you so well. Corny I know but it really is a case of 'arrive as holiday makers, leave as friends'.
reviews.title: Superb value for money, a great place to stay and it really is a 10 minute walk into town.

reviews.text: This place is great. Could not ask for more from a superb self catering establishment. Rooms are ample size, great size patio area, staff are so so friendly and the owners are great, anything you ask for, they will help you in a breath. Would definitely stay again, hopefully not to far in the distant future. Thanks for a great holiday. Nikki, Julie & Ange X
reviews.title: Perfect early summer season sunshine

reviews.text: A warm welcome received in quiet and picturesque setting just 10 mins walk from all the action in Hisaronu and easy access to Fethiye on the local and frequent buses. No need for a car. Good pool, bar and restaurant - delicious fish on BBQ. Very enjoyable boat trip on one of the smaller boats from Oludeniz. Good basic and clean accommodation, excellent value for the price.
reviews.title: Fantastic holiday

reviews.text: We have stayed at the start apartments for the last 2 year and have had a fantastic time both years so much so we can't wait to get back there this year again. Apartments are clean and tidy, staff both years have always been fantastic and friendly. Any problems were dealt with swiftly. Ali the manager was always helpful. Miranda and Engin the owners live on site and were alwsys friendly and helpful aswell.
reviews.title: great holiday
